类 Inbox

  • java.lang.Object

  • 所有已实现的接口:
    IReferable, Cachable, Serializable, Map<String,Object>

    public class Inbox
extends Bean
    "message" inbox which may including message, subject, task of anythings which owner is the user

    yjiang
